channel.title: Empath 13'er - Sign-up Stage - Canned
channel.description:
### Welcome to Empath 13'er [Based on Apoc's Empath 13'er](https://www.mafiauniverse.com/forums/threads/22042-Empath-13er-14er-Setup-Discussion) Host: Alice
### Gameplay Days will be 48 hours long, or shorter if someone dies. Nights will be 24 hours long. Actions are done by messaging me. The Mafia will be speaking through a separate Discord server. The factional kill be will mandatory and unassigned. Role and alignment will flip of death, but there are no logs or journals.
### Lynches To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" In the first day the lynch will be based purely by EoD plularity while in the following days it will be based off both majority and plularity.
### Rolecards
># **[color=forestgreen]Empath[/color]** >You have a n0 parity check between two players. When either of them dies they will be replaced by another player on a private list. You're aligned with the Town. > >_Your goal is to lynch all the Mafia._
># **[color=forestgreen]Vanilla Townie[/color]** >You have no special abilities, but you're aligned with the Town. > >_Your goal is to lynch all the Mafia._
># **[color=red]Mafia Rolecop[/color]** >Every night you can check a player to learn what is their role. You're aligned with the Mafia. > >_Your goal is to achieve parity with Town._
># **[color=red]Mafia Goon[/color]** >You have no special abilities, but you're aligned with the Mafia. > >_Your goal is to achieve parity with Town._ ### Rolelist: **[color=forestgreen]Empath[/color]** **[color=forestgreen]x9 Vanilla Townie[/color]** **[color=red]Mafia Rolecop[/color]** **[color=red]x2 Mafia Goon[/color]**
Players: 1. MathBlade 2. Yggdra 3. Magnus 4. H_Hjasik 5. Kai_5 6. HTM 7. WazzaAzza 8. Maxwell 9. James 10. DatBird 11. 12. 13.
This game will begin when both the sign-ups have been filled and either [FM] Danganronpa - Trigger Happy Havoc or Chaos Town FM have been finished.

item.title: Empath 13'er - Sign-up Stage - Canned
item.dc:creator: PoisonedSquid
item.description:
Okay, so how each Danganronpa games works is that sixteen students or “Ultimates” that specialize in a talent are forced into a killing game. How the killing game works is that in order to escape the killing game, an Ultimate must murder at least one other participant (Max of two) without getting caught. In this case, the Ultimate is considered the blackened. After the murder has been committed, there is a time period where the remaining participants investigate for evidence on how the murder happened and who is the blackened. After the period of investigation is over, everyone gathers around for a class trial where everyone discusses what they find and figure out who the blackened is. If the majority of votes are incorrect on who the culprit is, everyone but the blackened dies and the blackened can escape. However, if the majority of votes are correct, only the blackened dies through an execution (Usually related to their own talent) and the game continues until there are only two people left (Although that last part never happens since the last trial involves finding the Mastermind of the killing game)

Read full topic
